name: The Dark Veil: West Haven
description:
The Dark Veil: West Haven, is a Dark Fantasy Survival Horror that brings a fresh, yet familiar take on the classic survival horror genre.

Take on the role of Cyrus Tyllman, a weathered man in search for answers in an unfamiliar continent called Azdriel, which is covered in a mysterious, dark, mist-like fog. Along the way he will meet new unique characters, fight otherworldly enemies, and uncover deep dark secrets as he searches for hope.

Current Features:

- A mysterious deep story in a dark atmosphere



- Third-Person Fixed-Camera system



- Melee styled combat
